plantas.descrip: How can a single plant grow and shoot so many peas so quickly? Peashooter says, “Hard work, commitment, and a healthy, well-balanced breakfast of sunlight and high-fiber carbon dioxide make it all possible.”

skins.extra: Azure Pea gets angry when mistaken for an Ice or a Sad Peashooter.

skins.obtencion: Purchasing Deluxe Edition Upgrade or Origin Access Premier subscription
skins.extra: Never underestimate the supreme power of Chick Pea. NEVER!
